title: d3QuickMap
subhead: Javascript Plugin to display U.S. choropleath map using D3.js

demos.name: State Map
demos.blurb: Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Etiam porta sem malesuada magna mollis euismod. Donec sed odio dui.

demos.name: Automatic Color Scheme
demos.blurb: There are 5 builtin color schemes to use with this plugin: blue, red, green, orange, purple, and gray. Pick one and define it in colorScheme.
